dmca.title: Copyrighted Materials Distributed and Posted on Your Service
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Legal Dept [mailto:legal@memberpluscentral.org] 
Sent: Sunday, January 15, 2006 10:43 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyrighted Materials Distributed and Posted on Your Service

To Whom it May Concern:

Both owners of the domain and website www.memberpluscentral.org have in good
faith attempted to have the owners of www.zonetechs.com and
GAMERADDICTION.COM remove material that was stolen off our private forums,
and is being redistributed by reposting on their newsgroups at
privatenews.zonetechs.com, only to receive a quite rude reply in return.

This is an official copyright complaint on the illegal redistribution of a
post made on our private forums, and at this time, we ask for your
assistance in removing the material.

Attachments:
The stolen material
Copyright.jpg - proof of redistribution
Jungle_Puma - properties of person with date/time of upload Proof.jpg - that
it was originally first posted on my site

This is a clear and evident copyright violation, in that copyright applies
when materials first get uploaded to tangible media, a disk, a website or
other electronic media.

The contact person for these newsgroups is webmaster@gameraddiction.com.

All of this information is correct, and I do attest to that, under the
penalty of perjury.

Sandi Silarski (aka Naval)
6 Fredrick Drive
Mayflower AR 72106
Owner and Legal Representive
www.memberpluscentral.org
